subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Formula One's Michael Schumacher surpassed Ayrton Senna's record of 65 pole positions at the same track in Imola, Italy, where Senna died.
snippet: Formula One's Michael Schumacher surpassed Ayrton Senna's record of 65 pole positions at the same track in Imola, Italy, where Senna died.
